title: SuperMarioParty7
body:
I have a really big problem i can't enter the game because of the black screen after the Champion select and the windows popped up and says (Failed to Connect) (Unable to connect to the server please check your network connection and attempt to reconnect to your game)

Can somebody help me to fix and solve the problems?

replies.body:
Weird post title, but sure let's just roll with this.

There could be a number of different things causing your network to have such a hard time connecting to the game servers. Let's try a few different steps to make sure your network is setup so that it has the best chance to get linked up with us by running through this [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues). Let me know what seems to work or what doesn't!

Is his title more weird or that I'm irked by the fact that Super Mario Party 7 isn't a real game more weird? 

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}
